reviewText: The case for the DVD was damaged so he did not want it.
Charming stories that entertain my 2 year old grandson...a HUGE Thomas and Friends Fan. A good video to add to the Thomas DVD Collection.

I purchased this dvd specifically for Toby the Train pictured with the DVD. I was surprised when the train didn't come with the dvd so I called customer service and they refused to send Toby stating the description didn't mention a train although the picture clearly shows Toby on top of the dvd.
The product image pictured is not what you will receive, no train included this is the special edition and only has some push buttons on the front of the DVD  that make some sounds.
